qas.question: Why did most scientists accept the validity of evolution by the 1870s, but considered natural selection a minor part of it?

answers.text: they believed evolution was purposeful and progressive.

qas.question: What was meant by the term saltationism?

answers.text: new species were thought to arise through "jumps" rather than gradual adaptation
